public ref class SemaphoreAcl abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供了一种特定于 Windows 的扩展方法，用于通过特定的访问控制列表 (ACL) 安全性来创建 对象。

span.span: Provides a Windows-specific extension method for creating objects with specific access control list (ACL) security.

summary.span: 获取或创建 实例，允许在事件创建期间选择性地指定 实例来设置该实例。

span.span: Gets or creates an instance, allowing a instance to be optionally specified to set it during the event creation.

returns.span: 表示系统信号量（如果已命名）或本地信号量（如果未命名）的对象。

span.span: An object that represents a system semaphore, if named, or a local semaphore, if nameless.
